mapper.select: select id, user_id, mobile, nav_id, create_time, update_time from app_one_user_used where user_id = #{userId} order by update_time desc limit 4
mapper.delete: delete from app_one_user_used where id not in ( select id from app_one_user_used a where a.id in (select id from app_one_user_used b where b.user_id = a.user_id order by update_time desc limit 4))
